about_the_game:
Windbell is a platform action game that emphasizes combos and combat experience. There are hundreds of weapons and skills that can be freely matched in the game, and you can match your favorite fighting style as you like.


In this game, you play the role of Sol, in order to rescue the junior sister who was sealed in the ice, constantly wandering through the major secret realms, just to collect materials and forge the sharpest weapon in the world.


Every time you enter the secret realm, it's a new experience. The buffs and skills obtained during the rogue process will be integrated into the Sol's weapons when Sol leaves the secret realm.


You can use the powerful weapons fused in the secret realm to complete the tasks on the Heavenly Book, and the task rewards on the Heavenly Book can permanently improve a certain attribute of Sol.
